None.Name: Flame arrow
None.Description: Shoots a fiery arrow every 2 seconds, that deals 96 damage to enemies in a 5m range, up to 144 in total.

None.Name: Infused Firebug
None.Description: Activate to incinerate the tower. After 3 seconds it will have burnt down completely triggering a massive burst of flames that deals 400 damage to hostile ground entities in a 20m radius around it, up to 1200 in total.

None.Name: Life Stealer
None.Description: 15% of the damage dealt by the unit will be added to its life points.
